refnamediv.refpurpose: Distribute an audio signal across two channels.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Distribute an audio signal across two channels with a choice of methods.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: a1, a2 pan2 asig, xp [, imode]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: imode (optional) -- mode of the stereo positioning algorithm. 0 signifies equal power (harmonic) panning, 1 means the square root method, 2 means simple linear and 3 means an alternative equal-power pan (based on an UDO). The default value is 0.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: pan2 takes an input signal asig and distributes it across two outputs (essentially stereo speakers) according to the control xp which can be k- or a-rate. A zero value for xp indicates hard left, and a 1 is hard right.
